point.description: Index of the string within the bank.

point.description: Count of modules in the string.
point.label: Module Count

symbol.description: String is enabled and will connect next time battery is asked to connect.
symbol.label: String Is Enabled

symbol.notes: If string has multiple contactors, indicates that all contactors are closed.
symbol.description: String contactor is closed.
symbol.label: Contactor Status

point.description: Current status of the string.

point.description: Battery string state of charge, expressed as a percentage.

point.description: Battery string state of health, expressed as a percentage.

point.description: String voltage measurement.

point.description: Minimum voltage for all cells in the string.

point.description: Maximum temperature for all modules in the string.

symbol.description: String is unable to communicate with battery modules.
symbol.label: Communication Error

symbol.description: Battery string has exceeded maximum operating temperature
symbol.label: Over Temperature Alarm

symbol.description: Battery string is approaching maximum operating temperature.
symbol.label: Over Temperature  Warning

symbol.description: Battery string has exceeded minimum operating temperature
symbol.label: Under Temperature Alarm

symbol.description: Battery string is approaching minimum operating temperature.
symbol.label: Under Temperature Warning

symbol.description: Battery string maximum charge current has been exceeded.
symbol.label: Over Charge Current Alarm

symbol.description: Approaching battery string maximum charge current.
symbol.label: Over Charge Current Warning

symbol.description: Battery string maximum discharge current has been exceeded.
symbol.label: Over Discharge Current Alarm

symbol.description: Approaching battery string maximum discharge current.
symbol.label: Over Discharge Current Warning

symbol.description: Battery string voltage has exceeded maximum limit.
symbol.label: Over Voltage Alarm

symbol.description: Battery string voltage is approaching maximum limit.
symbol.label: Over Voltage Warning

symbol.description: Battery string voltage has exceeded minimum limit.
symbol.label: Under Voltage Alarm

symbol.description: Battery string voltage is approaching minimum limit.
symbol.label: Under Voltage Warning

symbol.description: Battery string state of charge has reached or exceeded SoCMin.
symbol.label: Under State of Charge Min Alarm

symbol.description: Battery string state of charge is approaching SoCMin.
symbol.label: Under State of Charge Min Warning

symbol.description: Battery string state of charge has reached or exceeded SoCMax.
symbol.label: Over State of Charge Max Alarm

symbol.description: Battery string state of charge is approaching SoCMax.
symbol.label: Over State of Charge Max Warning

symbol.description: A voltage imbalance exists between the modules in the battery string.
symbol.label: Voltage Imbalance Warning

symbol.description: A temperature imbalance exists between the modules in the battery string.
symbol.label: Temperature Imbalance Alarm

symbol.description: A temperature imbalance is developing between the modules in the battery string.
symbol.label: Temperature Imbalance Warning

symbol.description: A contactor failed to open or close as requested.
symbol.label: Contactor Error

symbol.description: One or more battery fans has failed.
symbol.label: Fan Error

symbol.description: Ground fault detected.
symbol.label: Ground Fault Error

symbol.description: One or more doors are open.
symbol.label: Open Door Error

symbol.description: Reserved bit.

symbol.description: A vendor specific alarm has occurred.

symbol.description: A vendor specific warning has occurred.
symbol.label: Other String Warning

symbol.description: Reserved bit.
symbol.label: Reserved

symbol.description: The battery string has been configured incorrectly and will not operate as expected.

symbol.label: Configuration Warning
